casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William M. HUGGINS No. 459P00-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 William M. Huggins, for Huggins, William M. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 5th of July 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied By Order of the Court in Conference, This the 17th of August 2017."
